title: Project evaluation
description: Please complete the questionnaire for one of your company's projects.The questionnaire consists of two parts. The first part allows you to reflect a brief summary of the project and involves answers to questions. The second part contains the questions in a closed form. The user in the Membership function column should indicate the degree of compliance of the variant with the user's project. Conformity assessment can be from 0 to 1. «1» means full compliance of the variant with the project. The most common answers are 0 or 1. But for the questions regarding   X3 , X4 ,  X5, X8 ,  X19    parameters, this may be a score between 0 and 1.

questions.question: Number of people involved in the project,X1
questions.name: q1
answers: More than 100
From 30 to 100
From 10 to 30
Less than 10

questions.question: Customer’s experience of working with this project team, X2
questions.name: q2
answers: Has never worked with this team
Worked with some members of the team
Worked with the project team leader
One or more common projects with the whole project team

questions.question: Team’s work experience in the given field,X3
questions.name: q3
answers: No work experience
Less than 2 years of work experience
From 2 to 5 years of work experience
More than 5 years of work experience

questions.question: Team’s understanding of requirements, adapting ability, initiative, X4
questions.name: q4
answers: Almost do not understand the requirements; require frequent explanations and constant control
Understand the requirements, can follow them, but require regular control
Understand the requirements, can follow them, do not require regular control
Have a good understanding of the requirements; can follow them without regular control; can suggest better alternatives

questions.question: Cooperation experience,X5
questions.name: q5
answers: Have never worked together
Worked together on the creation of a product but in the different field
Worked together on the creation of one product in a field of interest
Worked together on the creation of several products in the field of interest

questions.question: Knowledge of applied tools and methods, X6
questions.name: q6
answers: Tools and methods, applied in the given project, have never been used before and are unknown to the team
Tools and methods, applied in the project, are known to the team but have never been used before
Tools and methods, used in the project, are known to the team but are rarely used
Tools and methods are known to the team and have been widely used before

questions.question: Learning ability,X7
questions.name: q7
answers: It is hard for the team to learn new knowledge and technologies, and to adjust to changes
For some members of the team, it is hard to learn new information and technologies, but the team can adjust to changes
Easily absorb new knowledge, can adjust to changes
The team can easily absorb information, always tries to learn something new; can well adjust to the changes

questions.question: Team’s ability to clearly formulate and openly express ideas,  X8
questions.name: q8
answers: Can’t clearly formulate ideas and rarely express them
Can clearly formulate their ideas but rarely express them
Can clearly formulate their ideas and openly express them
Can clearly formulate, openly express and justify their ideas

questions.question: Ability to admit mistakes,X9
questions.name: q9
answers: Don’t admit their mistakes and can’t learn from them
Rarely admit their mistakes but try to never make them again
Openly admit their mistakes and try to never make them again
Openly admit their mistakes and always learn from them

questions.question: Team's ability to work effectively in conditions of freedom or full regulation,X10
questions.name: q10
answers: Work effectively in conditions of full regulation
Work effectively mostly in conditions of regulation
Work effectively mostly in conditions of freedom
Work effectively in conditions of full freedom

questions.question: Means of communication,X11
questions.name: q11
answers: Written reports. Formal documentation
Online texting (ICQ, E-mail)
Voice communication (telephone connection, Internet-conference)
Direct communication (meetings, video conferences)

questions.question: The frequency of reporting to the Customer,X12
questions.name: q12
answers: Reports on every activity
Reports on completing the blocks of work
Reports on the readiness of a project product component
Reports about project finish

questions.question: Understanding the scope of works ,X13
questions.name: q13
answers: There is a full list of works; further alternation is impossible
There is a detailed list of works, further alternation is possible
There is an approximate list of project works
The team understands the project goal and several ways for its achievement

questions.question: Consequences in case of unsatisfactory project outcome,X14
questions.name: q14
answers: The threat to human life
Loss of irreplaceable sum of money
Loss of a significant sum of money
Loss of insignificant sum of money/ reputational loss

questions.question: Project cost,X15
questions.name: q15
answers: More than 1 million $
From 300 thousand to 1 million $
From 100 to 300 thousand $
Less than 100 thousand $

questions.question: Requirements to the project quality,X16
questions.name: q16
answers: Highest international requirements
International requirements
National requirements
Local requirements

questions.question: Requirements to the realization period of the project,X17
questions.name: q17
answers: The period is unlimited
Not very urgent
Urgent
Very urgent

questions.question: Requirements to the precise compliance with a deadline ,X18
questions.name: q18
answers: The deadline should be strictly met
Insignificant deviation from the deadline is allowed
Considerable deviation from the deadline is allowed
Compliance with the deadline is not strictly required

questions.question: Requirements change percent /month,X19
questions.name: q19
answers: Less than 7%
From 7 to 25%
From 25 to 45%
More than 45%

questions.question: The probability of occurrence of risk events associated with the object architecture,  technologies, and processes of its creation, quality indicators,X20
questions.name: q20
answers: Risk events are not likely to occur [0,0.1]
Risk events might occur (0.1,0.5]
Risk events are highly likely to occur (0.5,0.75]
Risk events will most probably occur (0.75,1]

questions.question: The probability of external risk events occurrence (disruption of work by contractors, unfavorable political/economic situation in the country, market changes, etc.),X21
questions.name: q21
answers: Risk events are not likely to occur [0,0.1]
Risk events might occur (0.1,0.5]
Risk events are highly likely to occur (0.5,0.75]
Risk events will most probably occur (0.75,1]

questions.question: The probability of organizational risk events occurrence (disruption of funding, delivery of resources, inaccurate prioritizing, etc.),X22
questions.name: q22
answers: Risk events are not likely to occur [0,0.1]
Risk events might occur (0.1,0.5]
Risk events are highly likely to occur (0.5,0.75]
Risk events will most probably occur (0.75,1]

questions.question: The probability of managerial risk events occurrence (inefficient planning, controlling, communication problems, etc.),X23
questions.name: q23
answers: Risk events are not likely to occur [0,0.1]
Risk events might occur (0.1,0.5]
Risk events are highly likely to occur (0.5,0.75]
Risk events will most probably occur (0.75,1]
